com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection

Class SafeMethod<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.reflection.SafeMethod<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MethodAccessor<T>

    public class SafeMethod<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MethodAccessor<T>
    Wraps around the java.lang.reflect.Method class to provide an error-free alternative
    Exceptions are logged, isValid can be used to check if the Method is actually working

        public boolean isValid()
